text: @WhiteHouse One of every three infected people in the world is from USA. This is showing the terrible leadership to handle the Coronavirus situation.POTUS must be fired! And it is only going to get worse! Wake up America!USA leads number of deaths in the world with 28% of total!unacceptable!
